p: A geographical base map of China was downloaded from DIVA-GIS ( http://www.diva-gis.org). The DEM data with a 90 m spatial resolution was obtained from the CGIAR Consortium for Spatial Information (CGIAR-CSI, http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org/)[ 68]. Using ArcGIS 10.0 (Esri, Redlands, CA, USA), the slope and aspect were calculated.
